definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: A microcontroller is very similar to a microprocessor.
sentences.chinese: 微控制器很像微处理器。

sentences.english: Does electronical computer based on microprocessors made of silicon chip come to an end?
sentences.chinese: 以硅片微处理器为核心的电子计算机要走到尽头了吗？

sentences.english: Every year you can come up with microprocessor architecture.
sentences.chinese: 每年你都可以提出微处理器架构。

sentences.english: A microprocessor rests inside it which controls the magnetic field.
sentences.chinese: 在这个设备的内部，有一个控制着磁场的微处理器。

sentences.english: Center means the core of the system which is under the control of MPU.
sentences.chinese: 中心就是系统核心，由微处理器来控制整个系统工作。

sentences.english: PLC is a industry control equipment which cores on MPU.
sentences.chinese: PLC是以微处理器为核心的工业控制装置。

sentences.english: Very large-scale integration (VLSI) vastly increased circuit density, giving RisE to the microprocessor.
sentences.chinese: 大规模集成电路更大的增加了微处理器的电路密度。

sentences.english: Start with microprocessors as the core component microcomputer belong to D computer.
sentences.chinese: 以微处理器为核心组成的微型计算机属于D计算机。

sentences.english: You can see the usage of microcontroller in the products that is sold the best.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有热门产品中都能见到微处理器的身影。

sentences.english: I hope you enjoyed this first installment of the history of microprocessors.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你们可以喜欢介绍微处理器历史的第一部分。

sentences.english: Embedded 32-bit microprocessor with integrated floating-point unit.
sentences.chinese: 嵌入式32位具有集成的浮点单元的微处理器。

sentences.english: The behavior design and simulation of a 32-bit microprocessor chip sre described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍32位微处理器芯片的行为设计和行为模拟。

sentences.english: I finally narrowed down the problem to microprocessor churning during analog-to-digital-conversion cycles.
sentences.chinese: 我最终将问题定位到微处理器在模数转换期间的扰动。

sentences.english: The movements of the paramecia and the score are kept by a microprocessor.
sentences.chinese: 用一个微处理器来控制草履虫的移动和得分。

sentences.english: During the procession, the microprocessor finished the processing procedure.
sentences.chinese: 在步队前进时，微处理器实现了加工进程。

sentences.english: Each instruction may require a different sequence of operations to execute the instruction.
sentences.chinese: 当微处理器对该指令译码是，的操作序列来执行。

pinyin: zhuan1 yong4 ji2 cheng2 dian4 lu4
